titles: Poor Robin's visions wherein is described the present humours of the times, the vices and fashionable fopperies thereof, and after what manner men are punished for them hereafter : discovered in a dream.
author: Poor Robin.
Herrick, Robert, 1591-1674.
Winstanley, Robert, b. 1647?
Winstanley, William, 1628?-1698.
publisher: Printed for, and sold by Arthur Boldero,
notes: Attributed to William Winstanley whose nom de plume was Poor Robin; formerly attributed also to Robert Winstanley and Robert Herrick.  Cf. DNB, v. 21, p. 681.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
